title: Parameter - CSS Value (Color)
description: The parameter is echoed as a color value in a STYLE tag positioned into the HEAD.
body:
CSS Injection (Property Value)

The input is placed inside a color property.

Param: ?q=

This text changes color based on input.
objectives: Change the color to something else (e.g., red).
Break the syntax to inject a new property (e.g., font-size).
Try to break out of the declaration block using '}'.
hints: To execute XSS, you need to break out of the curly braces and the style tag.
